record.description: Family of nine lives in the boarded up store front, no windows, no heat, no hot water, no bath. Housing council (Metropolitan Housing and Planning) investigates. With cooperation several other housing agencies, got them moved to an adequate place.
record.subject1: Metropolitan Housing and Planning Council (Chicago, Ill.)
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Curling. Photographer stamp, handwritten date and caption.
